Categorize this IT Ticket:

credentials being requested repeatedly after lock computer specifically when close the lid as opposed to locking it sent wednesday re issues hi seems be working fine however still have issues with credentials being requested repeatedly after lock computer specifically when close lid opposed locking know sounds weird yes did check remember make any difference thank you sent tuesday issues hello could you please advise if you still encounter problems with there was problem today with want check if can be related could you please also tell if you use when entering credentials if you can connect with best regards analyst ext hub sent tuesday issues hello have issue with seems periodically ask for credentials however when enter them process loops restart computer refuses sync there way fix receiving because refuses sync thanks

message.reasoning:
**Categorizing Ticket Text**

I'm currently analyzing the provided IT ticket text to determine the most fitting category. My focus is on distilling the core issue to accurately map it to one of the available options: ["Hardware", "HR Support", "Access", "Miscellaneous", "Storage", "Purchase", "Internal Project", "Administrative rights"].

**Refining Ticket Categorization**

I've been deeply analyzing the recent IT ticket descriptions, focusing on recurring credential prompts and authentication loops tied to system lock events. My current thought process is converging on "Access" as the most accurate classification, given the repeated requests for credentials and refusal to sync.

**Identifying Access Issues**

My current focus is on the repeated credential prompts and authentication failures described in the IT ticket text. The recurring theme of system refusal to sync and looping processes after locking the computer strongly indicates an "Access" related problem.
